page.title: 11HOME LIFE RAFFORD AREA
page.content: The most popular aid in the home is the washing-machine.Only one house does not have one.Close behind in poularity is the fridge-freezer.There are only 7 dishwashing machines and 8 tumble-driers out of 41 households visited.All houses have at least one television and nearly all houses have a stereo system.The most popular meals are breakfast and lunch while at night dinner is more popular than high tea or supper.Meat is the most popular food and steak and chips the most popular meal closely followed by mince.Fish and chicken are not very popular.The most popular pets are dogs closely followed by cats.Many people keep fish and goats are also popular in the area.The least popular pets are gerbils,hamsters and mice.Only 2 people interviewed have burgular alarms.
